synopsis.text: Will ing to conquer Japan, the merciless Daigo Kagemitsu strikes a dark deal with 48 demons, offering his unborn child's body parts in exchange for supreme power. Born incomplete and immediately discarded into a river, the infant miraculously survives. Now a determined young man, Hyakkimaru embarks on a mission to reclaim his 48 stolen body parts by vanquishing the demons who possess them. Armed with prosthetic limbs concealing deadly blades, he crosses paths with Dororo, a tenacious young thief who insists on joining his quest. Together with a loyal puppy, Nota, they journey through a war-ravaged Japan, confronting both human cruelty and demonic malevolence as Hyakkimaru seeks to restore his body and find peace.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
